extension.description: Keymap Edit is a GUI for configuring mappings for remotes, keyboard and other inputs supported by xbmc. Note: existing user defined key mappings will be removed.[CR][I]This is a Keymap Editor fork. Credit goes to original creator (takoi)[/I]

extension.news: [I]Changes on this fork include:[/I] - Forked - Rebranded to Keymap Edit - Added some missing actions, categories, windows introduced in Kodi v17 and v18 - Re-organised windows and actions - Generated .xml is now properly indented, instead of 1 line - Fixed keymap reloading after save - Converted to current language formatting - Added Greek language - Pyhton 3/Kodi 19+ support - Added longpress support
